text: The Daily News Building, also known as The News Building, is a skyscraper located at 220 East 42nd Street in the Turtle Bay neighborhood of Midtown Manhattan, New York City. Built between 1928 and 1930, it was originally constructed to serve as the headquarters for the New York Daily News. ==References== Category:Skyscrapers in New York City Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan
title: Daily News Building
